attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we ave so many people comeing in to the country now we ave less and less jobs ,yet still our goverment is allowing our work and jobs go to other parts of the world? why? do you think so little of britan? are we not worth saving? think of the children all these exams they doing working so hard to get A LEVELS and for what loads of debt and no jobs to pay for it.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
